# PinguPriceWatch
### How to run it?
Just run the main.py file, and look into it for some code detail and stuff like that!

### Currently supported shops
* [Alternate](https://www.alternate.de/)
* [Berrybase](https://www.berrybase.de/)
* [Welectron](https://www.welectron.com/)
* [botland](https://botland.de/)
* [Rossmann](https://www.rossmann.de/)
